channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked Bin Shoot Flat 33 down, 16th December
item.description:
The bin shoot has been blocked for months and it smells bad, so must be rodent infested by now. Other residents have reported this and the reports keep being marked resolved but the shoot is still blocked.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Valette Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 16th December
item.description:
Fly tipping at 50 - 60 Heron Drive N4 2FZ. Can you please arrange collection at your earliest convenience. Many thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Heron Drive, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Flytipping on grass verge in the avenue, 16th December
item.description:
A resident with dementia living at number 3 has put a few bags of rubbish on the grass verge outside number 3 the avenue. Please can this be collected.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Avenue, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Double yellow lines faded, 16th December
item.description:
The double yellow lines on danson crescent and selwyn crescent have not been repainted. This is causing people to park on corners and over driveways while collecting there children. The rest of the high street and surrounding roads have be repainted but this have been left.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Selwyn Crescent, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-tipping near no.8, 16th December
item.description:
Dump of fly-tipping from neighbours. residents from the street are constantly coming to use the bin near no.8. there is currently a bbq, wood, and several other household items. please remove.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Barbauld Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Low hanging branches, 16th December
item.description:
The lower branches of this young tree need pruning and the canopy raised. They are currently about head height and difficult to see in the early low sun. My wife badly scratched her eye yesterday.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16-20, Mottingham Road, Mottingham, Greater London

item.title: Flytipping outside 99 Heversham Road (by Give Way sign), 16th December
item.description:
A bag of rubbish (unknown what is inside) has been dumped outside the property. From reviewing CCTV, I have attached a photo showing the rubbish bag falling out of a van with its back doors ajar. Foxes have ripped into it and all the rubbish is outside my property and will now get worse spreading into the driveway etc.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belmont Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Box of nitrous oxide cans flytipped, 16th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Lennard Road, Penge, Greater London

item.title: Automotive oil, 16th December
item.description:
Email received by CSC inbox 15/12/25 18:59 Fly-tipping Lat/Long - 51.4145576, -0.0726282 what3words - punks.toxic.bumps Nearest address - 57 Maberley Road, Anerley, London, SE19 2JE Fly tip of 4 bottles of automotive oil, dumped on pavement at the bend of Mayberley Road. Some was spilt onto pavement. Items have been here since last night Reference - 5187707 Map link - open Google map Report history - Status: Received 15/12/2025 18:58 Fly tip of 4 bottles of automotive oil, dumped on pavement at the bend of Mayberley Road. Some was spilt onto pavement. Items have been here since last night
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57, Maberley Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blue Spray Paint, 16th December
